mapper.update: delete from wish where mem_id = #{mem_id} and club_no = #{club_no}
mapper.select: SELECT j.wish_no, j.mem_id, j.club_no, NVL(downcnt, 0) downcnt, NVL(upcnt, 0) upcnt, NVL(joincnt, 0) joincnt, c.club_name FROM wish j, downcnt d, upcnt u, joincnt jo, club c WHERE j.club_no = d.club_no(+) and j.club_no = u.club_no(+) and j.club_no = jo.club_no(+) and j.club_no = c.club_no(+) and j.mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY wish_no desc
